content:
I've got it! Here's a list of the pet supplies you've bought recently:

**Luna (Cat)**

* Furminator deshedding tool
* New cat tree from Petco

**Max (Dog)**

* Kong toy
* Orijen dog food (new brand)

**General Pet Supplies**

* Pet camera (purchased last month)

Let me know if you'd like to add anything else to this list, such as the date of purchase, the cost, or any notes about the products. I can also help you keep track of any upcoming events, like vet appointments or grooming sessions, if you'd like!
